ref: 8885 prasmarati ʻ forgets ʼ Bālar. (prāsmaranta ʻ remembered ʼ MBh. is corrupt). [Scarcely with S. K. Chatterji Calcutta Review 1936, 292 sanskritization of *passaraï, *pamharaï < *apasmarati: rather for mng. ʻ forget ʼ cf *pramr̥ṣati and use of cognate prefix in Eng. forget. <-> √smr̥]
A. pāhariba ʻ to forget ʼ (whence caus. pāharāiba),
